root.name: Rings of Medusa
root.description: Set in a fantasy version of medieval Europe, players set out to earn money with which they can hire armies to recover the 5 Rings of Medusa, which can be used to overthrow a the tyrant Medusa who has taken over the land. You set up trade routes to buy and sell goods, hire armies which train over time and can assault towers, which will yield the eponymous treasures needed to win the game. There is also a gambling mode that... well, if you really want to gamble with your money that's your business, but if the house is smart you'll likely lose more than you gain. Don't throw your life away.
